Verses: 1 vanaandharamum Varanda Nilamum Magizhndhu, Kaduveli Kaliththu, Pushpaththaippola Sezhikkum.

2 adhu Migudhiyaai Sezhiththu Pooriththu Aanandhakkalippudan Paadum; Leebanonin Magimaiyaiyum Karmel Saaron Enbavaigalin Alangaaramum Adharku Alikkappadum; Avargal Karththarudaiya Magimaiyaiyum, Namadhu Dhevanudaiya Magaththuvaththaiyum Kaanbaargal.
3 thalarndha Kaigalaith Thidappaduththi, Thallaadugira Muzhankaalgalai Balappaduththungal.

4 manam Padharugiravargalaip Paarththu: Neengal Bayappadaadhirungal, Thidankollungal; Idho, Ungal Dhevan Needhiyai Sarikkattavum, Ungal Dhevan Padhilalikkavum Varuvaar; Avar Vandhu Ungalai Ratchippaar Endru Sollungal.
5 appozhudhu Kurudarin Kangal Thirakkappattu, Sevidarin Sevigal Thiravundupom.
6 appozhudhu Mudavan Maanaippol Kudhippaan; Oomaiyan Naavum Gembeerikkum; Vanaandharaththile Thanneergalum, Kaduveliyile Aarugalum Paaindhodum.
7 vettaandharai Thanneerththadaagamum, Varanda Nilam Neerootrugalumaagum, Valusarppangal Thaabariththuk Kidandha Idangalile Pullum Korukkaiyum Naanalum Undaagum.

8 ange Perumpaadhaiyaana Vazhiyum Irukkum; Adhu Parisuththa Vazhi Ennappadum; Theettullavan Adhile Nadandhuvaruvadhillai; Andha Vazhiyil Nadakkiravargal Pedhaiyaayirundhaalum Thisaikettup Povadhillai.
9 ange Singam Iruppadhillai; Dhushtamirugam Ange Povadhumillai, Ange Kaanappadavumaattaadhu; Meetkappattavargale Adhil Nadappaargal.

10 karththaraal Meetkappattavargal Thirumbi, Aanandhakkalippudan Paadi, Seeyonukku Varuvaargal; Niththiya Magizhchchi Avargal Thalaiyinmelirukkum; Sandhoshamum Magizhchchiyum Adaivaargal; Sanjalamum Thavippum Odippom.
